column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday October 29 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the northern split:
column4: The roadway is reportedly shutdown just prior to the split due to a semi that went off the roadway.  Crews are also working on a diesel spill.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the northern split:
column4: Traffic is being diverted onto I-64W.
